archimate:Capability.name: Workforce Configuration and Setup
archimate:Capability.documentation: Workforce Configuration and Setup applications provide the necessary functionality to appropriately configure the Workforce Management application, including the setup of working areas, staff information, activity types and related information, etc.

properties.value: Geographical work areas management Workforce appointment schedule configuration. Workforce dispatchability management Workforce Forecasting Workforce manual activities classification Workforce staff availability management Workforce technician training management
